settings.title: Introducing Fièra Citrus<br class="forMob"> Stem C Serum
settings.sub_title: A powerful combination of antioxidants and plant-based stem cells that gives the skin that dewy, radiant and firmer-looking glow.
settings.content: Alone, antioxidants and plant-based stem cells are amazing ingredients for younger-looking skin. When combined, this formula creates a haven for gorgeous, radiant skin free from wrinkles, skin sag and other imperfections.

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob">Stem C Serum Works
settings.sub_title: Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum fuses antioxidants, nourishing vitamins, stem cells, and hydrating ingredients together to bring the skin to another level of perfection. It improves your skin tone, reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and protects and preserves the appearance of beautiful vibrant-looking skin for years to come.
settings.content_1: Wave goodbye to age spots, blemishes and redness with powerful antioxidant activity, unveiling a new even-toned, smooth and glowing appearance to your skin.
settings.content_2: Banishes fine lines and wrinkles, providing a younger-looking version of you.
settings.content_3: Infused with citrus stem cells from oranges that are proven to improve skin elasticity, providing a firmer, tighter looking skin.
settings.content_4: Powerful antioxidants and hydrating ingredients help protect from free radicals and preserve a youthfully vibrant appearance.

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Caribbean Orange Oil
settings.content: A powerful antioxidant skin protector that diminishes uneven skin tone and fights off the signs of aging.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: The skin tissues LOVE Vitamin C due to its powerful antioxidant properties, helping to protect against free radicals and reducing the appearance of age spots, blemishes and redness.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Glycerin
settings.content: A “super hydrator” that firms, tightens, and accelerates skin softness.

settings.title: Citrus Stem Cells
settings.content: Scientifically-proven plant-based stem cells that delay the signs of skin aging and enhance the appearance of skin elasticity, giving your skin that firmer, tighter and smoother look and feel.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum contains the perfect formula of scientifically-proven ingredients to achieve even-toned, younger-looking skin, free from impurities and discoloration.
settings.popup_content: Water, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Saccharide Isomerate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Callus Culture Extract, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Carrageenan, Sclerotium Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Polyacrylate, Iron Oxide (CI77492), Iron Oxide (CI77491).

settings.content: Gently apply a pearl-sized amount onto the face, neck and other problem areas in an upward-stroking motion.
Use consistently in the morning when you wake up and at night before bed.
Repeat steps one and two every day and watch it work wonders for your skin’s appearance.
